overview:
SmartDesk Systems offer innovative, value-added voice applications to the public and private sector in the UK. They specifically deliver solutions in three areas:

1) Contact centre solutions designed to enhance the customer experience and your company’s reputation at a low cost

2) Secure mobile solutions for people who need to record mobile calls or who simply value privacy and protection of their identity

3) Voice controlled applications including conferencing tools and inspection audit solutions.

SmartDesk products are designed to reduce operational costs, maximise sales opportunities and improve employee satisfaction. They are also sufficiently flexible to work the way you do.

As all are accessed via the web, mobile or fixed line telephone, they are quick, easy to use and to install. They are also low-cost, offering you strong ROI whilst building your customers’ confidence in your business.
